modName: A dentist for Orsimers - HD teeth retexture
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4][i][url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/41/7b/417b41d9e6c05d3845ffaed9a92c53f2.png[/img]
[/url]
There are so many retextures for humans, elves, beasts. I mean teeth retextures. But orcs need some love too, so I decided to make their teeth in high quality. I like this race and I want them look nice. 
First time I thought that it will be a simple retexture, but it turned out that I should to rework ALL ther [/i][/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][i]oral cavity. So, now orcs have new tongue, new gums and, of course, new teeth. I think that they look muh better, than vanilla low textures now.

[/i][/size]
[/font]
[url=https://flic.kr/p/xfAbf3][center][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5819/20512159014_639c5577d8_z.jpg[/img][/center][/url]

[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/2f/a8/2fa8d1956c6fd5d07dacf9fabf2d500a.png[/img][/url]
[font=Georgia][size=4]
[/size][/font][font=Georgia][size=4][i]Just put texture folder into your Skyrim DATA.
Rewrite old files if it'll be necessary.
[/i][/size][/font]
[url=http://jpegshare.net/][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/33/32/3332f66201cd51bdb3ddebb3403cf70d.png[/img][/url]

[font=Georgia][size=4][i]Many thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6879930/][b]jesusoden[/b][/url] for help~[color=#ff0000]♥♥♥[/color]
*Magnificent screenshots*

[/i][/size][/font][center][font=Georgia][size=4][i][url=https://flic.kr/p/xUZyhw][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5636/20946747590_ceffba1cf2_z.jpg[/img]
[/url]
[/i][/size][/font][url=https://flic.kr/p/xfJvse][img]https://farm6.staticflickr.com/5764/20513784533_3765f4a2d9_z.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
author: redtox
